title: SET_PED_DENSITY_MULTIPLIER_THIS_FRAME
content:
0x95E3D6257B166CF20x039C82BB// SetPedDensityMultiplierThisFrame
void SET_PED_DENSITY_MULTIPLIER_THIS_FRAME(float multiplier);Parameters:multiplier: Adjust from 0.0 (minimum, indicating no pedestrians in the street) to 1.0 (maximum, representing a normal amount of pedestrians on the street).Usage: Call this native every frameExamples:LuaJavaScript-- 0.0 means no peds, while 1.0 indicates the regular density of peds.
local pedsDensityFactor = 0.0 

Citizen.CreateThread(function()
   while true do
       SetPedDensityMultiplierThisFrame(pedsDensityFactor)
       Citizen.Wait(0)    
   end
end)
codeBlocks:
